Class SimpleSceneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.SimpleSceneManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SceneManagerInterface

    public class SimpleSceneManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements SceneManagerInterface
    A simple scene manager that stores objects and lights in linked lists.
